name: Burgers (in a Pan)
steps: Carefully seperate Ground Beef into 8 equal chunks
Roll the Ground Beef chunks into beef spheres
For each bun, lightly spread a thin layer of mayo on the insides
Put a griddle or cast-iron pan on medium heat
Toast each bun until golden brown, then let rest on a grate
Warning: There's no time estimates here, cook it to your desired doneness
Put the beef balls on the griddle/pan and smash down into patties
Continue to apply pressure with a weight
When patties have maybe a minute left, add cheese/bacon (if applicable)
Once burgers are done, dress accordingly with your desired toppings and serve
comments: Definitely add the toppings of your choice, this recipe is for the base meat/bun preparation
Suggested Topping: American Cheese, Mayo, Lettuce, and Extra Red Onion
